profile:
Studio Linea is an Oakville-based company providing professional home staging and redesigning services to homeowners, realtors and home builders.
Studio Linea is a certified, registered home stagers company with the Real Estate Staging Association. It offers a dynamic and competitive edge to the art of home-staging.We offer professional services dedicated to assist homeowners in preparing their house for sale during this delicate time. Our commitment and passion to any project, small or large scale, has always been recognized by referrals and recommendations.

profile:
Our Clients are #1 priority so we truly believe in high business ethics as far as relations with our clients are concerned. We strongly intend to develop a closer trust based on a long-term business relationship with our clients. Equally important to us is that our quality of products delivered matches the quality of our service. Our furniture is well maintained and spotless. If an item in our collection is damaged, ripped, broken or stained… it does NOT leave our showroom.
When you team up with Stagers Choice, you get more than a catalog of fine furniture, you get a team of professionals willing to go beyond to help you with your project and make your experience with us efficient & profitable.

We have flexible prices & lease terms and delivery all over GTA is available within 24 hours.

profile:
Founded in 2019, we are one of the fastest growing home staging startup in Toronto and GTA.

While there are many staging companies on the market, none of them provides the staging quality per dollar we are looking for when we are trying to sell our own property. As such, we see an opportunity to create a better company that provides outstanding staging quality and value than what was available on the market.

R3 Home Staging specializes in providing the highest staging quality per dollar. We strongly believe this is the best way to deliver the best value to our clients.

Through a long streak of wildly successful projects and word of mouth, we are growing faster than we ever anticipated. We believe our integrity, core values and unique presentation styles play a strong part in our rapid growth.

R3 Home Staging provides differentiating designs to showcase a property’s strengths. We understand the market and consistently helps our clients achieve record breaking sale prices in many neighborhoods across GTA.

What makes R3 Home Staging different is we do not cut corners. We treat each property like our own and work diligently to ensure each of our projects meet our high bar of quality and exceptional presentation.

R3 Home Staging
(647) 928-6588
info@r3homestaging.com
services: Design Consultation | Vacant Home Staging | Occupied Home Staging | Interior Redesign

profile:
Home Decor Staging and Design has passion for beautiful homes. Nancy is a Certified UltimateStager TM and studied at the UltimateStager Academy TM. She has the ability to turn each room into a space that is both functional and inviting.
 
Her focus is on professionally staging homes that are soon to be sold. The Home Decor Staging team is able to transform your home into a space that will be attractive to a high percentage of home buyers. Staging it in such a way that the positives are highlighted. We offer a full range of services from a report advising the neccessary action to take  to full-staging should you want to leave the entire job up to us.
 
Nancy has a friendly personality and has the ability to understand, empathize and communicate with the home owner to achieve the very best result. Home Decor Staging is professional, dedicated and passionate about each and every home they work on, bringing a stress-free experience to each and every client.

profile:
SpaceStyle Home Staging, Organizing & Design is owned and operated by Erin Lazer, MBA, and Certified Staging Professional (CSP).  SpaceStyle has been serving happy customers for over 6 years.    

SpaceStyle is a full service home staging, organizing and design firm. Whether you are preparing your home for sale, looking to update or breath some life into your current space, or just need to get calm the clutter and get organized, we are here to help!  Here are some of the services we offer:

Consultations (Staging, Organizing or Design)
Staging Services (Maximizing your home's appearance using what you already have)

Furniture and Accessory Rentals (for Staging)

Design Services, including floor plans, sourcing and installing furniture, accessories, lighting, linens, art, window treatments, flooring, selecting finishes for bathroom/kitchen renovations, etc.

Organizing Services, including decluttering, sorting, designing and sourcing of storage solutions, closet organizers, built-ins, etc.

Proudly Serving the Great Toronto Area since 2012

Awards: 
RESA's 2017 Top 10 Home Stager of the Year Vacant Category Canada™
RESA's 2016 Top 10 Home Stager of the Year Occupied Category Canada™
RESA's 2015 Top 10 Home Stager of the Year Occupied Category Canada™
RESA’s 2013 Top 10 Rising Star Home Stager of the Year™ North America
name: Space Style Home Staging & Organizing

profile:
Molly Hilton started Design to Impress after nearly 30 years in home renovation and custom home building. Her unique design concepts can be traced back to every project she has had influence on. Every staged home is left with a personal touch that is Molly’s signature. Colours that make a home come alive. and unique pieces that are carefully placed to bring attention to the powerful features of your home are what you can expect.

No other home stager has the expertise, talent or systems that Design To Impress can provide. Our process for taking your home from an idea to a reality is unlike any other staging company you will find in the GTA, as each home is individually crafted from Molly’s impressive experience in home interior design.

Design to Impress, Toronto’s premier home staging company, has the expertise in not only small to large scale homes but specializes in condos and loft spaces as well. We understand that once a buyers representation agreement has been signed, timing is of the essence which is why our team of professionals are trained to work around the clock to finish a job in less than one and half days. Preparing a house to be sold may go beyond home staging, which is why we also specialize in contracting trades such as painters, electricians, general contractors and even landscapers. Design to impress has an efficiency rate like no other. We have had homes sell the very next day and no longer than 19 days from the completed staged job.
name: Design To Impress

profile:
Home Staging is the art of transforming a home into a sought after property that will stand out among the competing comparable listings in that area. As a professional Home Stager my goal is to bring about a dramatic makover with minimal cash layout which in turn results in the homeowner realizing a higher net profit. I share my knowledge and experience to make sure your investment will appeal to as many potential buyers as possible.

You want your propery to have a positive first impression and professional Home Staging can help turn that first impression into a sale. More and more Realtors are recommending staging as a marketing tool for their clients to create that emotional connection, making sure your propery stands out above the competition.
name: Unique Space Lift

profile:
Meet The Stagers are professionally trained to make a home look more appealing to the highest number of potential buyers, thereby selling a home more swiftly and for more money in the real estate market. We create an atmosphere for the potential buyer to feel at home while touring the property.
With 80% of potential buyers searching the internet, your home needs to stand out. It only takes 10 seconds for a potential buyer to make a decision about your home therefore it is very important to make a good first impression.

According to the National Association of Realtors, and reported by forbes.com, for every $100 invested in staging, the potential return is $400. “A staged home will sell for 17% more on average than a non-staged home, and 95% of staged homes sell in 11 days or less. That is statistically 87% faster than non-staged homes.”

Because buying a home is such an emotional process, a small detail can make or break a deal. Meet The Stagers understand what influences your prospects which will help get your house sold.

Our commitment to quality and service ensures that our clients are happy. Making everyone feel at home is our job and the beauty that comes with it is our passion!
name: Meet The Stagers
